original_text: He burned with anger also at Job's three friends because they had found no answer, although they had declared Job to be in the wrong.
korean_text: 또 세 친구에게 화를 냄은 그들이 능히 대답하지 못하면서도 욥을 정죄함이라

sentences.original_text: He burned with anger also at Job's three friends
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 욥의 세 친구에게도 분노를 태웠다

sentences.original_text: because they had found no answer
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 대답을 찾지 못했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: although they had declared Job to be in the wrong
